description:
A powerful slash attack. A little stronger than normal 
attacks.
name: Slash

description: An improved version of Slash, and more powerful.
name: Slash β

description:
A further improved version of Slash. Its power is also 
greatly increased.
name: Slash γ

description:
Delivers a crushing blow to the enemy. 
Has a slow start-up time.
name: Heavy Attack

description:
Swings the weapon with the full weight of one's body.
Activates at the end of the turn.
name: Last Break

description:
Unleashes a ferocious thrust attack, dealing damage 
that ignores the enemy's defence.
name: Breakthrough

description:
A powerful attack contained in a single slash. 
Enemies will be in pain for several turns.
name: Meteor Breaker

description:
Slashes twice at random enemies.
Each slash is weaker than normal attacks.
name: Flowing Lotus

description:
Slashes thrice at random enemies.
Each slash is weaker than normal attacks.
name: Flying Lotus

description:
Slashes four times at random enemies with 
lightning-fast speed.
name: Lightning Fang

description:
Unleashes thrust attacks at unbelievable speeds.
Attacks at the beginning of the turn.
name: Gale

description:
Unleashes a chain of high-speed thrusts.
Attacks at the beginning of the turn.
name: Flowing Gale Lotus

description:
Slashes an enemy with a dance-like movement.
Increases number of actions for several turns.
name: Sword Dance

description:
Sweep at an enemy's legs causing them to fall,
stunning them.
name: Clean Sweep

description:
Releases an oblong shockwave that streaks across the 
ground, stunning an enemy.
name: Ground Wave

description:
Stuns all enemies with a shockwave that shakes the very 
earth itself.
name: Ground Burst

description: Attacks by slashing all enemies at once.
name: Mono Flash

description: Attacks all enemies with a lightning-sharp strike.
name: Lightning Flash

description: A slashing attack imbued with the power of fire.
name: Flame Sword

description: A slashing attack imbued with the power of lightning.
name: Thunder Sword

description:
Attacks a single enemy with a burst of flame from a 
sword.
name: Blaze Slash

description: Fires 3 spells in a row that burns enemies.
name: Chain Burn

description:
Shoots lightning from one's sword 3 times at random 
enemies.
name: Imperial Thunder

description: Casts paralysis spell 3 times in a row.
name: Chain Paralyse

description: A slashing attack imbued with the power of light.
name: Shine Blade

description: A slashing attack imbued with the power of water.
name: Aqua Sword

description: A slashing attack imbued with the power of ice.
name: Ice Sword

description: Puts a single enemy to sleep.
name: Sleep

description: Attacks a single enemy with a tidal wave of water.
name: Water Lily

description: Casts sleeping spell 3 times in a row.
name: Chain Sleep

description: Attacks random enemies twice with an ice blade.
name: Cold Shard

description: Casts silence spell 3 times in a row.
name: Chain Silent

description: A slashing attack imbued with the power of earth.
name: Earth Sword

description: A slashing attack imbued with the power of wind.
name: Storm Sword

description: A sword of earth that pierces a single enemy.
name: Shinra Sword

description: Casts blinding spell 3 times in a row.
name: Chain Blind

description: Creates a blade of wind that cuts through all enemies.
name: Vacuum Wave

description: Casts panic spell 3 times in a row.
name: Chain Panic

description:
Sharpen your mind and strengthen your next turn's 
attack. Also restores a small amount of TP.
name: Charge

description: An attack that lowers the Crit Rate of a single enemy.
name: Luck Break

description: An attack that lowers the AGI of a single enemy.
name: Speed Break

description: An attack that lowers the DEF of a single enemy.
name: Guard Break

description: An attack that lowers MAT and MDF of a single enemy.
name: Magic Break

description: An attack that lowers the ATK of a single enemy.
name: Power Break

description: Performs 3 attacks that lower MAT and MDF.
name: Chain Magic Break

description: Restores a small amount of one's own HP, MP, and TP.
name: First Aid

description: Absorbs the HP of a single enemy.
name: Drain Sword

description: Absorbs enemy's HP 3 times in a row.
name: Chain Drain

description: Absorbs enemy's MP 3 times in a row.
name: Chain Magic Steal

description:
Sharpen your mind and strengthen your next attack.
Recovers a lot of TP, but consumes a lot of MP.
name: High Charge

description: Raises the Crit Rate of a single ally.
name: Enhance Luck

description: Raises the AGI of a single ally.
name: Enhance Speed

description: Raises the DEF of a single ally.
name: Enhance Guard

description: Raises the ATK of a single ally.
name: Enhance Power

description: Raises MAT and MDF of a single ally.
name: Enhance Magic

description:
Deploys a barrier that halves magic damage to all 
allies.
name: Magical Barrier

description:
Unleashes a series of super-fast thrusts at an enemy.
Increases own AGI.
name: Vortex Sword

description: Magic that recovers HP of all allies by about 1200.
name: Action Heal

description:
Recovers 700 HP for an ally and cures ailments. (Poison
/Blind/Silence/Confused/Sleep/Burn/Paralysis/Frozen)
name: Exceed Cure

description:
Magic that pre-emptively recovers about 400 HP.
Has poor MP efficiency.
name: Fast Heal α

description: Magic that recovers 500 HP for all allies.
name: All Heal

description: Magic that restores HP by about 500 and raises DEF.
name: Protect Heal

description: Recovers a small amount of HP each turn.
name: Regen

description:
Cuts off an enemy's breath.
Ineffective on some enemies.
name: Death

description:
Cures Poison, Burn, Blind, Frozen, and Confused for an 
ally.
name: Cure

description:
Revives a single ally with 50% HP and halves the damage 
they take in that turn.
name: Revive

description: Puts a single enemy to sleep.
name: Sleep

description: Raises the Crit Rate of a single ally.
name: Enhance Luck

description: Raises the AGI of a single ally.
name: Enhance Speed

description: Raises the DEF of a single ally.
name: Enhance Guard

description: Raises the ATK of a single ally.
name: Enhance Power

description:
Allies are immune to ailments for some turns. (Poison/
Blind/Silence/Confused/Sleep/Burn/Paralysis/Frozen)
name: Shiny Veil

description: Reduces water damage received by half. (x0.5)
name: Water DMG Reduction (Half)

description: Reduces earth damage received by half. (x0.5)
name: Earth DMG Reduction (Half)

description: Halves the chance of being poisoned.
name: Poison Half

description: Reduces lightning damage received by half. (x0.5)
name: Lightning DMG Reduction (Half)

description: Halves the chance of falling asleep.
name: Sleep Half

description: Halves the chance of being paralysed.
name: Paralysis Half

description:
The skill "Anti-Thunder" is available when equipped.
(*Fio only)
name: Anti-Thunder

description: Halves the chance of being blinded.
name: Blind Half

description: Halves the chance of being frozen.
name: Frozen Half

description: Reduces ice damage received by half. (x0.5)
name: Ice DMG Reduction (Half)

description: Increases the number of normal attacks by 1.
name: Normal +1

description: Normal attacks have 30% chance of inflicting Burn.
name: 30% Burn

description: Normal attacks have 70% chance of inflicting Burn.
name: 70% Burn

description:
The skill "Flame Beat" is available when equipped.
(*Fio only)
name: Flame Beat

description:
AGI goes up by 50, but DEF and MDF go down by 30.
(I'm not taking off my clothes!)
name: Streaking

description: The wearer's HP and MP recovery is increased by 50%.
name: Recovery Up

description:
The skill "Tickling" is available when equipped.
(*Fio only)
name: Secrets of Tickling

description:
Water Halved | AGI Reduced | ATK +25
(*Lena only)
name: Gel Soul

description:
Lightning Halved | Paralysis Immunity | DEF +15
(*Lena only)
name: Mother Soul

description:
Lightning Halved | Blind Immunity | AGI +30
(*Lena only)
name: Cult Soul

description:
Earth Halved | Stun Immunity | MDF +20
(*Lena only)
name: Pitter Soul

description: Reduces fire damage received by half. (x0.5)
name: Fire DMG Reduction (Half)

description: Normal attacks have 30% chance of inflicting Blind.
name: 30% Blind

description: Normal attacks have 70% chance of inflicting Blind.
name: 70% Blind

description: DEF goes up by 20, but AGI goes down by 20.
name: DEF +20 & AGI -20

description: Max HP goes up by 300, while Max MP goes down by 30.
name: HP +300 & MP -30

description: ATK goes up by 50, but Max HP goes down by 200.
name: ATK +50 & HP -200

description: Halves the chance of being stunned.
name: Stun Half

description:
Lower Physical DMG Received | Low Chance of Counter
(*Lena only)
name: Happy Soul

description: Reduces wind damage received by half. (x0.5)
name: Wind DMG Reduction (Half) obtained!

description: Halves the chance of being silenced.
name: Silence Half

description: Damage taken while defending is reduced to 1/4.
name: Guard Strength 200%

description: Damage taken while defending is reduced to 1/6.
name: Guard Strength 300%

description: Damage taken while defending is reduced to 1/10.
name: Guard Strength 500%

description: Normal attacks have 30% chance of inflicting Sleep.
name: 30% Sleep

description: Normal attacks have 70% chance of inflicting Sleep.
name: 70% Sleep

description:
The skill "Revolve Storm" is available when equipped.
AGI +10. (*Fio only)
name: Harpy Soul

description:
The skill "Exceed Ray" is available when equipped.
MAT +20. (*Fio only)
name: Sitter Soul

description:
Wind Halved | Lower Magic DMG Received | Max MP +30
(*Lena only)
name: Fuu Rai Soul

description: Reduces light damage received by half. (x0.5)
name: Light DMG Reduction (Half)

description: Normal attacks have 30% chance of inflicting Stunned.
name: 30% Stunned

description: Normal attacks have 70% chance of inflicting Stunned.
name: 70% Stunned

description:
Increases number of normal attacks by 3.
Max HP Halved | Max MP Halved
name: Vulnerable Strike

description:
Fully revive a single ally and greatly reduce damage 
they take that turn.
name: Angel Revive

description:
Shuts down the bodily functions of all enemies.
Ineffective against some enemies.
name: Death To All

description:
Deals two air-splitting slashes ignore defence on all 
enemies.
name: Lightning Flash

description:
Magic that pre-emptively recovers HP by about 700.
Has poor MP efficiency.
name: Fast Heal β

description:
The skill "Spark Field" is available when equipped.
DEF +10. (*Fio only)
name: Execution Soul

description:
The skill "Bind Lock" is available when equipped.
Immunity to stun. (*Fio only)
name: Puppet Soul

description:
Light Halved | Confusion Immunity | MDF +30
(*Lena only)
name: Crown Soul

description: Reduces dark damage received by half. (x0.5)
name: Dark DMG Reduction (Half)

description: Reflects magical attacks, but DEF becomes 0.
name: Anti-Magic Seal

description: Halves the chance of being weakened.
name: Weakened Half

description:
ATK is doubled.
However, HP and MP are decreased tremendously.
name: Bam Rifle

description:
AGI +500
Elemental damage received is doubled.
name: Nudie style

description: Item drop rate from battles is doubled.
name: Treasure Hunt

description:
The skill "Hell Breath" is available when equipped.
Dark DMG received (x0.8). (*Fio only)
name: Pandora Soul

description:
The skill "Drain Kiss" is available when equipped.
HP Regen 5%. (*Fio only)
name: Succubus Soul
